Title: Relates to remedies for trademark dilution
Summary: Relates to remedies for trademark dilution; allows the court, in its discretion, to enter judgment for an amount of three times such profits and damages and/or reasonable attorneys' fees of the prevailing party.
LawCode: Amd ยง360-l, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to remedies for dilution
